mapper.sql: id, older_id, startTime, endTime, totalFees, NumberID, generateTime, generator_id, generator_name, isPay, payee_id, payee_name, isClosed, closed_id, closed_name, closedTime, payTime, closeNumber, notes, cleared, settled_flag, settle_id

distinct

mapper.insert: insert into pension_temppayment (id, older_id, startTime, endTime, totalFees, NumberID, generateTime, generator_id, generator_name, isPay, payee_id, payee_name, isClosed, closed_id, closed_name, closedTime, payTime, closeNumber, notes, cleared, settled_flag, settle_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{olderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totalfees,jdbcType=REAL}, #{numberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{generatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{generatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{generatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ispay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isclosed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{closedId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{closedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{closedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{closenumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{settledFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{settleId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update pension_temppayment
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
older_id = #{record.olderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update pension_temppayment set older_id = #{olderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, totalFees = #{totalfees,jdbcType=REAL}, NumberID = #{numberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, generateTime = #{generatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, generator_id = #{generatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, generator_name = #{generatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isPay = #{ispay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payee_id = #{payeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payee_name = #{payeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isClosed = #{isclosed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, closed_id = #{closedId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, closed_name = #{closedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, closedTime = #{closedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, payTime = #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, closeNumber = #{closenumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cleared = #{cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, settled_flag = #{settledFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, settle_id = #{settleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT o.name as older_name, o.id as older_id, bu.name as building_name, f.name as floor_name, r.name as room_name, be.name as bed_name, dn.level as nurse_level, db.level as bed_type_level, l.visitTime as visitTime, IF(o.sex > 1,'女','男') as older_sex, o.birthday as birthday from pension_older o, pension_livingrecord l, pension_building bu, pension_floor f, pension_room r, pension_bed be, pension_dic_bedtype db, pension_dic_nurse dn where dn.id=l.nurseLevel_id and db.id=l.bedType_id and bu.id=f.build_id and f.id=r.floor_id and r.id=be.room_id and be.id=l.bed_id and l.older_id=o.id and o.id=#{olderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and o.statuses in (3,4,5)

SELECT n.*,
o.`name` as older_name,
IF(o.sex > 1,'女','男') as older_sex,
o.birthday as birthday,
bu.`name` building_name,
f.`name` as floor_name,
r.`name` as room_name,
be.`name` as bed_name,
dn.`level` as nurse_level,
dbt.`level` as bed_type_level,
l.visitTime as visitTime,
IF(n.isPay > 1,'否','是') as isPayStr,
IF(n.isClosed > 1,'否','是') as isCloseStr
from pension_building bu,
pension_floor f,
pension_room r,
pension_bed be,
pension_temppayment n,
pension_older o,
pension_livingrecord l,
pension_dic_bedtype dbt,
pension_dic_nurse dn
where bu.id=f.build_id
and f.id=r.floor_id
and r.id=be.room_id
and be.id=l.bed_id
and l.bedType_id=dbt.id
and l.nurseLevel_id=dn.id
and o.id=n.older_id
and l.older_id=n.older_id
and n.older_id=#{olderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and o.`name` like #{orderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and n.isPay=#{paidFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and unix_timestamp(n.generateTime) >=unix_timestamp(#{searchStartDate})
and unix_timestamp(n.generateTime) <=unix_timestamp(#{searchEndDate})
and o.statuses in (3,4,5)
and n.cleared = 2 ORDER BY n.generateTime DESC

select pn.id, (pd.itemlFees*pd.number) as totalfees, pn.generateTime as generatetime, pn.isPay as ispay,pn.isClosed as isclosed, pn.payTime as paytime, pn.closedTime as closedtime,pd.itemlFees, pd.item_name as itemName,pd.number from pension_temppayment pn,pension_temppaymentdetail pd where pd.payment_id=pn.id and pn.older_id=#{olderId}

SELECT n.*,
IF(n.isPay > 1,'否','是') as isPayStr,
IF(n.isClosed > 1,'否','是') as isCloseStr
from
pension_temppayment n
where
1=1
and n.older_id=#{olderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and n.cleared = 2 ORDER BY n.generateTime DESC
